    • 构造器详细资料

        public ViewModel(AylaDevice device)

    • 方法详细资料

      • fromDeviceList

        public static java.util.List<ViewModel> fromDeviceList(java.util.List<AylaDevice> devices)
        Helper method to create a list of ViewModel objects from a list of AylaDevice objects. This method obtains the ViewModelProvider from AMAPCore.SessionParameters to create each ViewModel from each AylaDevice object.
        参数:
        devices - List of AylaDevice objects
        返回:
        list of ViewModel objects

      • getDevice

        public AylaDevice getDevice()

      • getManagedPropertyNames

        public java.lang.String[] getManagedPropertyNames()
        返回:
        an array of property names that should be managed by the SDK. These properties will be kept up-to-date automatically by the SDK.

      • getNotifiablePropertyNames

        public java.lang.String[] getNotifiablePropertyNames()
        Returns an array of property names that can be used in notifications. The defatlt implementation returns an empty array, as we know nothing about the notifications of an unknown device.
        返回:
        An array of property names that can be used to set a notification

      • getSchedulablePropertyNames

        public java.lang.String[] getSchedulablePropertyNames()
        Returns an array of property names that can be used in schedules. The default implementation returns an empty array, as we know nothing about the schedules of an unknown device.
        返回:
        An array of property names that can be set in a schedule

      • friendlyNameForPropertyName

        public java.lang.String friendlyNameForPropertyName(java.lang.String propertyName)
        Returns a friendly name for a property name. This is used in schedules when presenting a choice to the user regarding which properties to control. For example, a SwitchedDevice overrides this method to return "Switch" when refering to the "outlet1" property used to control the switch.

        The default behavior is to return the property's displayName, if present, or the property name.

        参数:
        propertyName - Property name to translate into something presentable to the user
        返回:
        The friendly name for the property

      • scheduledActionNameForProperty

        public java.lang.String scheduledActionNameForProperty(java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                       boolean setAction)
        Returns an action string for a particular property for when it is set or cleared in a schedule. This string represents the action the user will be performing when setting or clearing a property for a schedule. The default implementation returns "Turn on" if setAction is true, or "Turn off" if setAction is false. The text returned from this method will be presented to the user as options to manipulate this property in response to a schedule event.
        参数:
        propertyName - Name of the property
        setAction - True if the action is to set, false if the action is to clear
        返回:
        a string indicating the action

      • getDeviceNotificationThresholdForType

        public int getDeviceNotificationThresholdForType(AylaDeviceNotification.NotificationType notificationType)
        Returns the notification threshold used for creating DeviceNotifications. Derived classes may override this value if desired. 300 seconds (5 minutes) is the default.
        参数:
        notificationType - Type of notification in question
        返回:
        Notification threshold in seconds for the supplied notificationType.

      • getNotificationTypes

        public AylaDeviceNotification.NotificationType[] getNotificationTypes()
        Returns an array of notification types that should be set when creating a new notification. The DeviceNotificationHelper class calls this method to determine which notification types should be created for this device when email, push or SMS notifications are enabled for the device (device notifications).
        返回:
        An array of notification types

      • deviceTypeName

        public java.lang.String deviceTypeName()
        Returns a string indicating the device type. This string is used when referring to the actual type of the device, such as "Door Sensor" or "Ayla EVB". It should not change based on any characteristics of the specific device, such as device name or state.
        返回:
        The name of the type of the device

      • registrationType

        public AylaDevice.RegistrationType registrationType()
        Returns the registration type used to register this type of device. Derived classes should override this method to return the appropriate registration type for the device.
        返回:
        The registration type used to register this device

      • getDeviceState

        public java.lang.String getDeviceState()
        Returns a string representing the state of the device (on, off, open, closed, etc.) The default implementation returns nothing.
        返回:
        A string representing the state of the device

      • getObservablePropertyName

        public java.lang.String getObservablePropertyName()
        Returns the observable property name for this device.
        返回:
        The observable property name of the device, or null if none.

      • isIcon

        public boolean isIcon()
        Returns true if this object does not represent an actual device, for example objects that are used to display the possible set of device icons. Default returns false.
        返回:
        true if this object does not represent an actual device

      • isOnline

        public boolean isOnline()
        Returns true if the device state is online
        返回:
        true if the device state is online

      • setDatapoint

        public <T> void setDatapoint(java.lang.String propertyName,
                             T datapointValue,
                             ViewModel.SetDatapointListener listener)
        Sets the specified property to the specified value and calls the listener when complete.
        参数:
        propertyName - Name of the property to set the datapoint on
        datapointValue - Value to set the datapoint to
        listener - Listener to receive the results of the operation

      • getProperty

        public AylaProperty getProperty(java.lang.String name)
        Pass-through to our devices's getProperty method
        参数:
        name - name of the property to get
        返回:
        the AylaProperty for the given name, or null if not found

      • isInLanMode

        public boolean isInLanMode()
        Returns true if the device is in LAN mode
        返回:
        true if the device is in LAN mode

      • isGateway

        public boolean isGateway()
        Returns true if the underlying device is a gateway
        返回:
        true if the underlying device is a gateway

      • isNode

        public boolean isNode()
        Returns true if the underlying device is a node
        返回:
        true if the underlying device is a node
